finder.query: WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT <> ?dealRmngBalGrsAmt01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd02? ) AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_BAL_PK = ?arTrxBalPk01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND AR_TRX_TP_CD = ?arTrxTpCd01? AND DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT <> ?dealRmngBalGrsAmt01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD =?arCashApplyStsCd02? ) AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND ATT_ADJ_NUM = ?attAdjNum01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_BAL_PK = ?arTrxBalPk01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD <> ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR DEAL_ORIG_GRS_AMT <> DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT OR DEAL_APPLY_GRS_AMT <> ?dealApplyGrsAmt01? OR DEAL_APPLY_CASH_DISC_AMT <> ?dealApplyCashDiscAmt01? OR DEAL_APPLY_CR_AMT <> ?dealApplyCrAmt01? OR DEAL_APPLY_ADJ_AMT <> ?dealApplyAdjAmt01? ) AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND AR_TRX_TP_CD = ?arTrxTpCd01? AND AR_TRX_BAL_PK = ?arTrxBalPk01? AND DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT <> ?dealRmngBalGrsAmt01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd02? ) AND PAYER_CUST_CD = ?payerCustCd01? AND DEAL_CCY_CD = ?dealCcyCd01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND AR_TRX_TP_CD = ?arTrxTpCd01? AND AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? AND DEAL_APPLY_GRS_AMT = ?dealApplyGrsAmt01? AND DEAL_APPLY_CR_AMT = ?dealApplyCrAmt01? AND DEAL_APPLY_ADJ_AMT = ?dealApplyAdjAmt01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT <> ?dealRmngBalGrsAmt01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd02? ) AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND ATT_ADJ_NUM = ?attAdjNum01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT <> ?dealRmngBalGrsAmt01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd02? ) AND EXPT_FLG = ?exptFlg01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT <> ?dealRmngBalGrsAmt01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd02? ) AND DEAL_CCY_CD = ?dealCcyCd01? AND EXPT_FLG = ?exptFlg01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND DEAL_RMNG_BAL_GRS_AMT <> ?dealRmngBalGrsAmt01? AND ( AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd01? OR AR_CASH_APPLY_STS_CD = ?arCashApplyStsCd02? ) AND ROWNUM < 3 AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND AR_TRX_NUM = ?arTrxNum01? AND AR_TRX_TP_CD = ?arTrxTpCd01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
